meals.name: Bbq Chicken Thighs
meals.recipe: Preheat oven to 400. Coat the thighs in olive oil. Cook for 50 minutes, then take out and coat with bbq sauce and cook for an additional 10 minutes.

meals.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
meals.recipe: Brown ground beef with chopped onion and garlic. Add tomato sauce. Serve over cooked spaghetti.

meals.name: Grilled Salmon
meals.recipe: Marinate salmon in a mixture of lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Grill until cooked through.

meals.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
meals.recipe: Stir-fry mixed vegetables and tofu with soy sauce, ginger, and garlic. Serve with rice.

meals.name: Chicken Alfredo
meals.recipe: Cook chicken and slice. Cook fettuccine pasta. Make a sauce with heavy cream and Parmesan cheese. Combine all ingredients.

meals.name: Taco Salad
meals.recipe: Brown ground beef with taco seasoning. Serve over a bed of lettuce with chopped tomato and cheese.

meals.name: Vegetarian Pizza
meals.recipe: Top pizza dough with tomato sauce, bell peppers, mushrooms, and olives. Bake until crust is golden brown.

meals.name: Teriyaki Chicken
meals.recipe: Marinate chicken thighs in teriyaki sauce. Grill or bake until cooked through. Serve with rice and steamed broccoli.

meals.name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken
meals.recipe: Stuff chicken breasts with a mixture of spinach and feta cheese. Sauté in olive oil with garlic until chicken is cooked.

meals.name: Mushroom Risotto
meals.recipe: Sauté mushrooms and onion. Add arborio rice and cook with white wine. Stir in parmesan cheese until creamy.

meals.name: Honey Glazed Ham
meals.recipe: Glaze ham with a mixture of honey and brown sugar. Bake and garnish with pineapple slices.

meals.name: Chicken Wings
meals.recipe: preheat oven to 400. Put tin foil on baking sheet. Put wings on wire rack and sit on baking sheet. Cook 60 minutes
